PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05422021-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActFederal Courts Act
SubjectCommissioners for Administering Oaths ** Tax Court of Canada **
PrecisOrder directing that commissions do issue under the Great Seal of Canada EMPOWERING ONE OFFICER of the Courts Administration Service to ADMINISTER OATHS and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the TAX COURT OF CANADA.
AttachmentsAttachment
